title: Caring Companion Bot
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, highly detailed, 3D Anime style, full body shot, (9:16 aspect ratio), a cute and friendly humanoid robot (android) with smooth white armor and glowing blue screen face, holding a silver watering can. The robot is carefully watering a large potted Monstera plant. The scene is set in a bright, clean art studio interior, filled with lush green houseplants (pothos, snake plants) on wooden shelves and wooden furniture. Dramatic natural sunlight streams through a large arched window, casting long, defined shadows on the floor. Minimalist decor, soft volumetric lighting, clean line art.
negativePrompt: low quality, bad anatomy, deformed, worst quality, blurry, extra limbs, ugly, poorly drawn face, watermark, text, signature, cartoon, realism, photo
